title: Ill gotten gains of Mahadev app found their way to small cap stocks
description: In a significant development in the ongoing probe into the Mahadev app-linked money laundering case, ED froze a few days ago shares worth Rs 1,100 crore held in demat accounts linked to a Dubai-based "hawala operator", an accused in the case.  Recently, the chairperson of Sebi said the regulatory body is actively scrutinizing the small and mid-cap segments for additional signs of manipulation.
content: (You can now subscribe to our Economic Times WhatsApp channel)
